name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Turtle Power!
summary: The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles are always off on exciting adventures, and now they need your help! Play along with ten interactive learning games that teach about mathematics, science, geometry, vocabulary, and more. Tilt the tablet up and down to move and jump in the Turtle Skateboard game. Read the "Mousers Attack!" e-book and enjoy photo activities and two creative games.
